DOC.brief_summary: The principal aim study verify whether program supervise , multimodal physical exercise improve cognitive function and/or reduces rate cognitive decline older adult
DOC.detailed_description: Community-dwelling volunteer , recruit social center , invite in-person assessment include medical history questionnaire examination , anthropometric measurement , blood test cardiovascular risk , several outcome measure . Participants meet inclusion criterion divide 3 group ( participant without subjective objective cognitive impairment , subjective memory complaint mild cognitive impairment ) randomly assign ( 1:1 ) experimental group control group , use list random number generate statistical software . The list keep seal envelope researcher , directly involve recruitment evaluation participant , assign allocation number .
DOC.criteria: Age > 50 year old Medical condition compromise survival limit physical activity Geriatric Depression Scale15 score 6 high Alcohol intake > 4 units/day Mini Mental State Examination < 24 Clinical Dementia Rating score 1
